titles.title: To amend title 39, United States Code, to prevent mass mailings from being sent as franked mail, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 11/4/1993--Introduced. Declares that it is the intent of the Congress that a Member or Member-elect may not mail any mass mailing as franked mail. Repeals provisions authorizing such mail. Requires any amount remaining in an official allowance of a Member of the House of Representatives at the end of the session of Congress or other period for which the allowance is made available to be returned to the Treasury for deficit reduction.
